013package org.apache.juneau.rest.guard;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
016import java.util.*;
017
018import org.apache.juneau.*;
019import org.apache.juneau.cp.*;
020import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
021
022/**
023 * A list of {@link RestGuard} objects.
024 *
025 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
026 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/Guards">Guards</a>
027 * </ul>
028 */
029public class RestGuardList {
030
031   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
032   // Static
033   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
034
035   /**
036    * Static creator.
037    *
038    * @param beanStore The bean store to use for creating beans.
039    * @return A new builder for this object.
040    */
041   public static Builder create(BeanStore beanStore) {
042      return new Builder(beanStore);
043   }
044
045   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
046   // Builder
047   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
048
049   /**
050    * Builder class.
051    */
052   @FluentSetters
053   public static class Builder extends BeanBuilder<RestGuardList> {
054
055      List<BeanCreator<RestGuard>> entries;
056
057      /**
058       * Constructor.
059       *
060       * @param beanStore The bean store to use for creating beans.
061       */
062      protected Builder(BeanStore beanStore) {
063         super(RestGuardList.class, beanStore);
064         entries = list();
065      }
066
067      @Override /* BeanBuilder */
068      protected RestGuardList buildDefault() {
069         return new RestGuardList(this);
070      }
071
072      //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
073      // Properties
074      //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
075
076      /**
077       * Appends the specified rest matcher classes to the list.
078       *
079       * @param values The values to add.
080       * @return This object.
081       */
082      @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
083      public Builder append(Class<? extends RestGuard>...values) {
084         for (Class<? extends RestGuard> v : values)
085            entries.add(beanStore().createBean(RestGuard.class).type(v));
086         return this;
087      }
088
089      /**
090       * Appends the specified rest matcher objects to the list.
091       *
092       * @param values The values to add.
093       * @return This object.
094       */
095      public Builder append(RestGuard...values) {
096         for (RestGuard v : values)
097            entries.add(beanStore().createBean(RestGuard.class).impl(v));
098         return this;
099      }
100
101      // <FluentSetters>
102
103      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanBuilder */
104      public Builder impl(Object value) {
105         super.impl(value);
106         return this;
107      }
108
109      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanBuilder */
110      public Builder type(Class<?> value) {
111         super.type(value);
112         return this;
113      }
114
115      // </FluentSetters>
116   }
117
118   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
119   // Instance
120   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
121
122   private RestGuard[] entries;
123
124   /**
125    * Constructor.
126    *
127    * @param builder The builder containing the contents for this list.
128    */
129   protected RestGuardList(Builder builder) {
130      entries =
131         builder
132            .entries
133            .stream()
134            .map(BeanCreator::run)
135            .toArray(RestGuard[]::new);
136   }
137
138   /**
139    * Returns the entries in this list.
140    *
141    * @return The entries in this list.
142    */
143   public RestGuard[] asArray() {
144      return entries;
145   }
146}
